name: sendExchange(to:data:localizableMessageKey:arguments:timeout:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends an exchange request that contains your game data to one or more participants.
declaration:
func sendExchange(to participants: [GKTurnBasedParticipant], 
             data: Data, 
localizableMessageKey key: String, 
        arguments: [String], 
          timeout: TimeInterval, 
completionHandler: ((GKTurnBasedExchange?, Error?) -> Void)? = nil)
